datasets.label: Drupal Core default · Dec 21, 2025
datasets.description: Baseline Gemini pipeline run that seeded the shared palette update work. Shows how the default prompt handles WCAG triage across 30 issues.

datasets.label: Drupal Core default · Dec 22, 2025
datasets.description: Most recent default run for Drupal core, captured after palette tuning. Useful for spotting regressions or improvements versus the Dec 21 export.

datasets.label: Drupal Core · Gemma 3 (Dec 17, 2025)
datasets.description: Alternative Gemma 3 pass over the same backlog so reviewers can compare tone, precision, and WCAG mapping against the Gemini outputs.
